title: What are the 11th biology 1st chapter notes? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1st chapter of 11th biology textbook is The Living World. According to me,no notes are required for that chapter. Study it completely from ncert and mark the important points in it. During revision,go through those highlighted points. That is enough for the preparation of that chapter for neet. Hope this helps😊

You can make notes from unacademy by anand sir ……. Or you also can download pdf of 1st chapter notes from unacademy notes series And you also tell me if you want then i will send you the link of 1st chapter notes🙂
